name: environment_scenario_get_the_logs_of_a_specific_application_deployed_in
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to get the logs of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: get the logs of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

I can fetch those logs — I need a couple details first.

- Which environment? (e.g., dev, staging, prod) — I will run check_environment_exists(env_name) first.
- Which application name?
- Optional: a query (e.g., ERROR), time_range (e.g., 1h) or a deployment start ISO timestamp (since_timestamp) for newly deployed apps.

Defaults: time_range = 15m, size = 50 lines. For new deployments, prefer since_timestamp to avoid old logs.

What do you want to do next?

[options-single-choice: Provide Environment & App, List Environments, Cancel]
